column4: Xiaomi unveils in-house chipset to streamline production  cut prices
column5: BEIJING  Feb 28 Chinese smartphone firm Xiaomi Inc announced its first in-house designed chipset on Tuesday  as it works to streamline production  lower prices  and gain greater control over handset design to counter the impact of slowing sales.
